message: I'm in this session right now: http://2011.jsconf.us/#/proposal/6f23fd600302403a9f53e113900ea477
http://www.socrata.com/ is primarily for quick display of existing data sets for government.
Avni is now talking about Google Fusion Tables, which look really cool and easy to  build visualizations from Google Spreadsheets: http://www.google.com/fusiontables
She mentioned using OpenHeatMap for easily building heat maps http://www.openheatmap.com/
RHOK blog post with map visualization showing women attendance: http://www.rhok.org/2011/04/a-call-to-action-for-women-programmers/
Avni's matrix of map visualization solutions: http://www.flickr.com/photos/lancefisher/5681418887/
